line_1: Down the deep chasms, the snowfed torrents foam,
line_2: And builds his humble, happy home.

line_1: Vault on the Seas, and vex the rising Foam;
line_2: No more they wanton dive, or giddy roam,

line_1: Or bursts upon the rocks with whitening foam,
line_2: As musing pensive in my silent home

line_1: To listen to th' Atlantic foam,
line_2: Is this a time on Cambrian hills to roam,

line_1: Th' envenom'd monsters spit their deadly foam,
line_2: To blast the laurel that surrounds his tomb.

line_1: White o'er his head the circling waters foam.
line_2: He said; — and plunging to his crystal dome,
